title: Welcome to XHubSell
subtitle: Next.js 14 App Router + NestJS Monorepo
description: A modern e-commerce platform for sellers and buyers

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get started with XHubSell in three simple steps. Connect, collaborate, and succeed.

step1.title: Browse Sellers
step1.description: Explore our extensive network of verified sellers and find the perfect match for your needs. Filter by category, rating, and location.

step2.title: Contact and Hire
step2.description: Reach out directly to sellers, discuss your requirements, and hire with confidence through our secure platform.

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Track progress, collaborate effectively, and achieve your goals with the support of our trusted sellers.
